summary: Worker crashes with LoaderError when a referenced workflow file is not found. The node-side error handling needs improvement and core may not be handling the failure correctly.
userImpact: Worker crashes when referencing non-existent workflow files, preventing graceful error handling and making the failure difficult to debug.
rootCause: Worker does not handle missing workflow files gracefully; core is not properly handling the loader failure.
proposedFix: Add error handling on the node side to catch and handle LoaderError appropriately; ensure core properly handles workflow load failures.
resolutionDetails: Error handling added on the node side with test coverage; core updated to properly handle workflow file loading failures.
